mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BID (BIDID, PRODUCTID, USERID, BIDPRICE, SIGNDATE, BIDRESULT) VALUES (#{bidId}, #{productId}, #{userId}, #{bidPrice}, #{signDate}, #{bidResult})
mapper.update: UPDATE BID SET BIDPRICE = #{bidPrice} WHERE BIDID = #{bidId}
UPDATE BID SET BIDRESULT = 1 WHERE BIDRESULT = 0 AND BIDPRICE = (SELECT MAX(BIDPRICE) FROM BID WHERE PRODUCTID = #{productId})
UPDATE BID SET BIDRESULT = 2 WHERE BIDRESULT = 0 AND BIDPRICE != (SELECT MAX(BIDPRICE) FROM BID WHERE PRODUCTID = #{productId})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(BIDPRICE) FROM BID WHERE PRODUCTID = #{productId}
SELECT USERID, PRODUCTID, BIDPRICE, BIDRESULT, SIGNDATE FROM BID WHERE USERID = #{userId}
